entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
